name: wger
description: wger is a self-hosted workout, nutrition, and weight tracking manager. It lets users plan routines, log exercises, track calories and body metrics, and generate statistics through a comprehensive fitness-focused web application.
features: Workout planning: Create custom workout routines with exercises, sets, reps, and rest periods.
Exercise database: Access a comprehensive library of exercises with descriptions, images, and muscle group targeting.
Progress tracking: Log workout sessions and track performance improvements over time with detailed statistics.
Nutrition management: Plan meals, track calories, macronutrients, and maintain a food diary for diet goals.
Weight tracking: Monitor body weight changes with charts showing trends and progress toward fitness goals.
Measurement logging: Record body measurements like waist, chest, and arms to track physical changes.
Workout calendar: Schedule training sessions and view your workout plan in a calendar format.
Exercise variations: Find alternative exercises targeting the same muscle groups for workout variety.
Rest timer: Use built-in timers to track rest periods between sets during workouts.
PDF generation: Export workout plans and nutrition schedules as PDF files for offline reference.
Multi-language support: Use the application in multiple languages for international fitness enthusiasts.
API access: Integrate with fitness apps or build custom tools using the REST API.
